text:
Hi there, 

Trying to find a library of custom code workflows coded in python, but even in the developer’s HubSpot website there nothing relevant, anyone interesting to share some good practice ?

Hi all, I'm trying to create a document on a users local desktop from within custom code and open it within web window. Webbrowser seems to have no joy when running from Custom Code. Does anybody know if this is possible? I suspect because of the localised environment, the answer may be no...

Hi everyone! Somebody could help me with this question please: In the workflows does the component "Send a Webhook" send automatically within the header the key "Content-Length" with the length of the request automatically calculated ? Or does it not send this key? which is mandatory for external API provider like AWS
Lots of these are in python, but honestly most people prefer to use Node
Yeah custom code runs in lambdas which run in the cloud so this isn't possible

:wave-yeti: Hey folks, I’m a designer on the HubSpot workflows team hear to share with you…

You can now add descriptions to your Custom Code Actions!!
beautiful update, been waiting for this one forever! Love it man!
<@U06BDSCBP5M> Can you give some more details, I’m working on a commercial product that a part of this solution would live in but I can help answer some stuff vs trying to sell you something.

Thanks <@U032JBY6BAR>!
Well I’m trying to create a lead rotation between team members, for multiple teams on my portal..
The thing is that you can only use the built in lead rotation for users with paid seats, and I’m using that for different kinds of users that don’t need the seat for any other purpose than this.
The weighted rotation example on HubSpot custom code library uses the users’ IDs in the code, which makes it not that scaleable.

I’m looking for a solution that knows how many members are in a given team, and gives equal opportuinty to receive that lead between all the team members.
